heading: HB05512
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE RULES AND POLICIES ON THE DOMESTIC ADMINISTRATIVE ADOPTION PROCEEDING OF FILIPINO AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on WELFARE OF CHILDREN since 2019-11-20
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05512
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE RULES AND POLICIES ON THE DOMESTIC ADMINISTRATIVE ADOPTION PROCEEDING OF FILIPINO AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Proposes to suspend the issuance of the marriage license in the absence of the consent of the parents or guardians of the contracting parties who are either or both 18 to 21 years old, when they failed to obtain such consent either because of their failure or the refusal of said persons having legal charge of them to give consent.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SAULOG, IRENE GAY F.
DATE FILED : 2019-11-18
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Nieto (000 2020-02-12)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WELFARE OF CHILDREN ON 2019-11-20
